modal.title: Order a website for your business now, And get a small gift from us 10% off!
modal.subtitle: Satisfying every customer is our highest goal - LIMSA
modal.notification: Your request has been accepted, we will be in touch soon!!

hero.title: Perfect 'IT' solutions to grow your business!
hero.text: Entrust your project to experts with more than 10 years of experience and achieve high success in a short time.

card1.title: Why are the prices so cheap?
card1.text: Our prices are really cheap compared to the quality. The reason is that we don't have excess labor in our web studio, so we don't have excess costs. That's why we keep our prices low compared to others.

card2.title: Will I be able to edit the site myself in the future?
card2.text: Yes, of course, you will be given access and instructions to the content management system (adminka). Adminka has a convenient interface, is intuitive and does not require specific knowledge.

card3.title: Will you continue to support the site after it's finished?
card3.text: Once we've finished your site, we'll keep it running for free, 24/7 for one year. After one year, it's $10/month.

services.title: Why us? Why most people choose us?

card1.title: Adaptive
card1.text: The websites we create will be flexible. That is, they will have a tablet and mobile version. There will be no separate payment for this.

card2.title: Admin
card2.text: Your website will have a convenient and simple admin panel that will allow you to manage the site from within.

card3.title: Protection
card3.text: Our websites are protected by modern anti-virus and firewalls to resist spambots and attacks.

card4.title: Monitoring 24/7
card4.text: Your website is automatically monitored online 24 hours a day to keep it up and running.

card5.title: Domain and Hosting
card5.text: Domain and hosting run around, forget about headaches. We have domain UZ and hosting free for 6 months (then $10/month)

card6.title: Unique
card6.text: The design of each site we create will be unique and different from other sites. One design is one site!

card.title: LANDING PAGE
card.text: Another name for a one-page site is a Landing Page. The page is easy to use and introduces the customer to the information they need.

card2.title: SITE CARD
card2.text: It is the 'business card' of the company on the Internet. The site is to introduce the company's services or products to the people visiting the business page.

card3.title: Exclusive
card3.text: This website is created based on your order. You can order any website you want.
